required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Tolerance and Pharmacokinetics of SHR1459 in Patients With Recurrent Replased/Refractory Mature B Cell Neoplasmstumor
clinical_study.official_title: Phase 1 Study to Evaluate the Tolerance and Pharmacokinetics of SHR1459 in Patients With Recurrentreplased/Refractory Mature B Cell Neoplasms Tumor

brief_summary.textblock: SHR1459 is a selective small molecule BTK inhibitor developed by Jiangsu Hengrui medicine Limited, by inhibiting the phosphorylation of BTK and down regulation of BCR signal transduction pathway, And then selectively inhibit the proliferation and migration of B cell tumor.

detailed_description.textblock: SHR1459 is a selective small molecule BTK inhibitor developed by Jiangsu Hengrui medicine Limited, by inhibiting the phosphorylation of BTK and down regulation of BCR signal transduction pathway, And then selectively inhibit the proliferation and migration of B cell tumor. The objective of this phase 1 study is to evaluate the safety and tolerance of SHR1459 in patients with replaced/refractory mature B cell neoplasms, in order to determine the maximum tolerated dose (MTD) and recommended dose for phase 2 clinical study (RP2D);

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence and severity of treatment-emergent adverse events (AEs) [Safety and Tolerability])
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of about 6 months
primary_outcome.description: The incidence and severity of treatment-emergent AEs will be collected and the safety and tolerability of SHR1459 will be assessed

primary_outcome.time_frame: 28 days since the date of first dose
primary_outcome.description: Recommended phase 2 dose (RP2D) and/or maximum tolerated dose (MTD) will be established according to the incidence of dose-limiting toxicities (DLTs) of escalated doses of SHR1459

secondary_outcome.time_frame: every 8 weeks through study completion, an average of about 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: Assess the response rate of subjects to the treatment of SHR1459

secondary_outcome.time_frame: every 8 weeks through study completion, an average of about 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: Assess the duration of complete/partial response after the treatment of SHR1459

secondary_outcome.time_frame: every 8 weeks through study completion, an average of about 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: Assess the survival condition of the subjects after the treatment of SHR1459

secondary_outcome.time_frame: every 8 weeks through study completion, an average of about 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: Assess time to response of SHR 1459 after treatment

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and Day 2 of the single dose
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetics profile of a single dose SHR1459 and its metabolite (plasma): Time to peak (Tmax) of plasma concentration

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and Day 2 of the single dose
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetics profile of a single dose SHR1459 and its metabolite (plasma): Maximum plasma concentration (Cmax)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and Day 2 of the single dose
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetics profile of a single dose SHR1459 and its metabolite (plasma): Halflife (T1/2)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and Day 2 of the single dose
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetics profile of a single dose SHR1459 and its metabolite (plasma): Clearance/ bioavailability (CL/F)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and Day 2 of the single dose
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetics profile of a single dose SHR1459 and its metabolite (plasma): apparent volume of distribution/bioavailability (Vd/F)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and Day 2 of the single dose
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetics profile of a single dose SHR1459 and its metabolite (plasma): Area under curve (AUC)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 of cycle 1 to day 1 of cycle 4 (28 days/cycle)
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetics profile of a single dose SHR1459 and its metabolite (plasma): Area under curve, steady state (AUCss)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 of cycle 1 to day 1 of cycle 4 (28 days/cycle)
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetics profile of a single dose SHR1459 and its metabolite (plasma): Maximum plasma concentration, steady state (Cmax,ss)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 of cycle 1 to day 1 of cycle 4 (28 days/cycle)
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetics profile of a single dose SHR1459 and its metabolite (plasma): Time to peak, steady state (Tmax,ss)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 of cycle 1 to day 1 of cycle 4 (28 days/cycle)
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetics profile of a single dose SHR1459 and its metabolite (plasma): Halflife (T1/2)

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent volume of distribution, steady state/bioavailability (Vss/F)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 of cycle 1 to day 1 of cycle 4 (28 days/cycle)
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetics profile of a single dose SHR1459 and its metabolite (plasma): Apparent volume of distribution, steady state/bioavailability (Vss/F)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 of cycle 1 to day 1 of cycle 4 (28 days/cycle)
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetics profile of a single dose SHR1459 and its metabolite (plasma): Clearance/ bioavailability (CL/F)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 of cycle 1 to day 1 of cycle 4 (28 days/cycle)
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetics profile of a single dose SHR1459 and its metabolite (plasma): Accumulation index (Rac)

arm_group.description: Oral administration, once a day, 28 days for a cycle, until the disease progression or the intolerable toxicity occurs.

intervention.description: SHR1459 will be administered continually till disease progression or unacceptable toxicity.

overall_official.affiliation: Blood Institute of the Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences

facility.name: Blood disease hospital of Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences
